comments.author: jorendorff@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jorendorff@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Currently, WatchpointMap is a single-level map whose keys are <JSObject *, jsid> pairs called WatchpointKeys.

Probably what we want is a WeakMap<JSObject *, ObjectWatchpoints>, where ObjectWatchpoints contains a second Map<jsid, Watchpoint>. This would eliminate the tricky GC-related code in jswatchpoint.cpp (about 70 lines).
comments.raw_text:

I would like to work on this bug could help me out how to move on this bug ?
